member.name: T:TestingLib.Helper
member.summary: Methods that can be helpful, but do nothing by themselves.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Helper.ListAllEnemies
member.summary: Lists all enemies in current level.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Helper.ListAllItems
member.summary: Lists all items.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Instances
member.summary: Contains instances of some things in the game.

member.name: F:TestingLib.Instances.QMM_Instance
member.summary: Instance of Quick Menu Manager.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Enemy
member.summary: Helpful methods for making debugging of enemies easier.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Enemy.DrawPath(UnityEngine.LineRenderer,UnityEngine.AI.NavMeshPath,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Draws the NavMeshAgent's pathfinding. Should be used in `DoAIInterval()`. Do note that you need to add line renderer in your enemy prefab.

member.name: T:TestingLib.OnEvent
member.summary: Contains Events that can be subscribed to.

member.name: E:TestingLib.OnEvent.PlayerSpawn
member.summary: Event for when player spawns.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Patch
member.summary: Contains patching methods that can be run at any time or are time sensitive.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Patch.AnyTime
member.summary: Contains patching methods that can be run at any time.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.AnyTime.IsEditor
member.summary: Patches the game to think it is running in Unity Editor, allowing us to use the in-game debug menu.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.AnyTime.InfiniteSprint
member.summary: Patches the game to allow infinite sprinting by always setting SprintMeter to full.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.AnyTime.SkipSpawnPlayerAnimation
member.summary: Skips the spawn player animation so you can start moving and looking around as soon as you spawn.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.AnyTime.OnDeathHeal
member.summary:
Instead of dying, set health to full instead.
This helps with testing taking damage from your enemy, without death being a concern.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Patch.TimeSensitive
member.summary:
Contains patching methods that can't be run at any moment, mostly too early.
Every method in this class has information on when it can/should be run.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.TimeSensitive.ToggleTestRoom
member.summary:
Toggles the testing level from the debug menu.
Should be ran on OnEvent.PlayerSpawn or later.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Patch.All
member.summary:
Patches all methods in Patch.AnyTime and Patch.TimeSensitive:
IsEditor()
InfiniteSprint()
SkipSpawnPlayerAnimation()
OnDeathHeal()
ToggleTestRoom() // runs on OnEvent.PlayerSpawn

member.name: T:TestingLib.Tools
member.summary: Contains helpful methods for testing.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Tools.TeleportLocation
member.summary: Specify the Teleport Location in the test level.

member.name: F:TestingLib.Tools.TeleportLocation.Inside
member.summary: Teleports you inside the testing maze.

member.name: F:TestingLib.Tools.TeleportLocation.Outside
member.summary: Teleports you outside in the testing level.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Tools.TeleportSelf(TestingLib.Tools.TeleportLocation)
member.summary: Teleports you to the location specified in the test level.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Tools.SpawnEnemyInFrontOfSelf(System.String)
member.summary: Will find the enemy by name, and spawn it.

member.name: M:TestingLib.Tools.GiveItemToSelf(System.String)
member.summary:
Give an item to yourself.
Bug: Grab text appears on screen when holding object, until dropped and picked up again.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Lookup
member.summary: Contains things to look up.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Lookup.Item
member.summary: Names of items.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Lookup.EnemyInside
member.summary: Names of inside enemies.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Lookup.EnemyOutside
member.summary: Names of outside enemies.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Lookup.EnemyDaytime
member.summary: Names of Daytime Enemies.

member.name: T:TestingLib.Plugin
member.summary: Plugin class.

member.name: F:TestingLib.Plugin.ModGUID
member.summary: The Mod GUID of TestingLib.
